mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture_archive_file( lecture_archive_file_uuid, lecture_archive_file_original, lecture_archive_no, lecture_archive_file_size, lecture_archive_file_type, lecture_archive_file_count, lecture_archive_file_createdate )VALUES( #{lectureArchiveFileUuid}, #{lectureArchiveFileOriginal}, #{lectureArchiveNo}, #{lectureArchiveFileSize}, #{lectureArchiveFileType}, #{lectureArchiveFileCount}, NOW() )
